name: FKIImplementationGuide
title: FKI Implementation Guide
description: Danish municipalities implementation guide for common informationmodel

resource.name: CommonCareSocialCarePlan
resource.description: Overall CarePlan for Danish municipalities, for individual plans regarding social care, and health act §140 and §119

resource.name: CommonCareSocialCitizensOwnObservation
resource.description: Citizens own observation of performance level (udførelse) or importance level (betydning) as defined by FSIII

resource.name: CommonCareSocialCompletedIntervention
resource.description: Documentation for completed inteventions (activities related to one and only one encounter) in Danish municipalities

resource.name: CommonCareSocialCondition
resource.description: Detailed information about conditions in Danish municiplities health, social and elderly care.

resource.name: CommonCareSocalEncounter
resource.description: Encounters used for care and social services in Danish municipalities.

resource.name: CommonCareSocialEvaluation
resource.description: Professional evaluation on citizen status based on gathered information, conditions, observations and citizen preferences used in Danish municipalities

resource.name: KLCommonCareSocialFFBGoal
resource.description: FFB goal as defined by FFB in Danish municipalities

resource.name: CommonCareSocialFollowUp
resource.description: Follow-up results used in Danish municipalities

resource.name: CommonCareSocialGoal
resource.description: Goal as defined in Danish municipalities

resource.name: CommonCareSocialInformation
resource.description: Information used in Danish municipalities (Oplysning/Område/Tema)

resource.name: KLCommonCareSocialInformationGathering
resource.description: Information gathering resource used to group all the information collected in a clinical process such af a nursing status, a functional ability evaluation or a social paedagogical review

resource.name: CommonCareSocialInformationSeverity
resource.description: Information severities in Danish municipalities

resource.name: KLCommonCareSocialObservation
resource.description: Observations and measurements performed in Danish municipalities

resource.description: Planned interventions (indsats/ydelse) in Danish Municipalities

resource.description: Purpose as defined by FFB in Danish municipalities

resource.description: Referals/requests used in Danish municipalities

resource.description: Observation of functional level severities in Danish municipalities

resource.description: Structured assesment of needs as performed in Danish Municipalities

resource.description: Structured follow-up result used in Danish municipalities

resource.name: CommonCitizen
resource.description: Citizen demographics, as expressed by Danish municipalities

resource.description: Conditions which may be used for cross sector exchange in Denmark, as expressed by Danish municipalities.

resource.description: Organisation as expressed by Danish municipalities.

resource.description: Practitioners as expressed by Danish municipalities.

resource.description: Service performing CareTeam as expressed by Danish municipalities.

resource.name: BasedOnServiceRequest
resource.description: A reference to a ServiceRequest. Used to connect an event resource with the order that warranted it

resource.name: ConditionRank
resource.description: The rank of a condition. Used for event-resources that refer to conditions that are ranked.

resource.name: FollowupEncounter
resource.description: Extension for pointing to previous and planned follow up encounters for a condition

resource.name: RequesterType
resource.description: Extension for pointing to type of organisation/person that requests a service from the municipality

resource.name: SubjectConsentToLiaising
resource.description: Extension for describing whether the citizen knows about the request/referal

resource.name: KLCarePlanCategoryCodes
resource.description: Codes for constraining the CarePlan category

resource.name: KLChangeValueCodes
resource.description: Change values for goals (måltype). Express the target value for change of a condition

resource.name: KLChangeValueCodesFFB
resource.description: Change values for goals in FFB (FFB måltype). Express the target value for change of an activity or participation condition

resource.name: KLChangeValueCodesFSIII
resource.description: Change values for goals in FSIII (FSIII måltype). Express the target value for change of a health condition or funtional condition
